labelHomeIntro: Start by setting up your trial.
modalTextSetupWarning: This will delete your existing data. Are you sure?
pageAboutParagraphOne: GridScore is a field trial phenotyping app for time-based data. It lets you keep track of events that happen in the field on a plot-level basis. This could be anything from plant emergence to flowering date.
pageAboutParagraphTwo: GridScore has been developed by Sebastian Raubach. If you have any questions, suggestions or general feedback, please contact Sebastian.
